segments.text: I attended school today . Did you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wasn't able to attend school because I was feeling ill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that . Would you like the assignments from English class ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would really appreciate that , thanks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you get sick , I'll return the favor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . See you at school tomorrow if you feel better .
segments.speaker: S2
